common.messages

Class TextMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.messages.TextMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KVMessage

    public class TextMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements KVMessage
    Represents a simple text message, which is intended to be received and sent by the server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface common.messages.KVMessage
